_xResult.title: Royalty Only Black Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made lace dress with gold embellishments
_xResult.longdesc:
Samshek's custom made variation on the LBD comes with thick, full-coverage lace and dusty gold embellishments on the neck and sleeves. As with everything Samshek does, though, this dress is up to you.  

 

The dress pictured is high-neck with short sleeves and embellishments and it is cut to above the knees. Prefer it as a mini dress you can go dancing in? They can accommodate that. Would rather have the gold out of the way and stick to a pure black dress? They can do that too. Be sure to select customizations below for this dress. You may also indicate in the customizations box exactly how many inches or centimeters long you'd like your dress to be.

 

This fabric was produced toxin-free—the mirror and the earth will thank you!

properties.propvalue: Hand wash or dry clean, air dry
